question: Write a letter to local authorities by requesting additional sports facilities for your age in your area.Mention about the current sports facilities available.What kind of additional sports facilities should be introduced?How the new sports facilities would be a help for the people in your age group.
text: I am a resident of the old  town.I am a captain of my school football team and I hereby request you to open a football field  for us to practice  in the local community sports club.

Right now the clubhouse has a badminton court and a swimming pool along with a gym.These  are well maintained and regularly used by the community.A lot of people are also happy with the in-house sports events conducted regularly by the members of the association.My family makes it a point to use the club facilities during weekends for rejuvenation.

However,I feel that in addition to these,a football field is a must for people in my group.Furthermore,a yoga room with mats will be well utilised by the senior citizens,who otherwise travel daily to other parts of the town to practice yoga.

Physical education plays an important role in shaping an individual's personality.Regular gaming installs discipline and team spirit.The addition of a new football field will help in preparing for their inter-school sports challenge,scheduled on the 25th of May.The winning team has a chance to play at the national level.
